title: Cooperation with other entities
context: ยง144-13 Cooperation with other entities. The department may cooperate with and enter into agreements with governmental agencies of this State, other states, agencies of the federal government, and private associations to carry out the purpose and provisions of this chapter. [L 1979, c 186, pt of ยง1; ree and ren L 1983, c 214, pt of ยง2]
